Name: Aspirin
Description: Used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation. It can treat or prevent heart attacks, strokes, and chest pain.

Name: Ibuprofen
Description: Used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation caused by many conditions such as headache, toothache, back pain, arthritis, menstrual cramps, or minor injury.

Name: Clindamycin
Description: Treats serious infections caused by bacteria.

Name: Diltiazem
Description: Treats hypertension or symptoms of angina (chest pain).

Name: Claritin
Description: An antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Treats allergy symptoms.

Name: Methamphetamine
Description: A central nervous system stimulant. It is used to treat ADHD.

Name: Voltaren
Description: Reduces substances in the body that cause pain and inflammation.

Name: Ketoprofen
Description: Used to treat pain or inflammation caused by arthritis.
